name: Glow Chess
description: Immortal classic - a game that has been for many thousands of years - Chess - comes back in a new form, now with neon lights!
minimum_requirements: OS: xp Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel GMA DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: any
recommended_requirements: OS: 7, 8, 10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: better then Intel GMA DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: any
